mapper.select: select catalog_id, catalog_name, driver_class_name, jdbc_url, username, password, is_forbidden, is_available, create_time, update_time from t_driver_catalog where catalog_id = #{catalogId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_driver_catalog(catalog_name, driver_class_name, jdbc_url, username, password, is_forbidden, is_available, create_time, update_time) values (#{catalogName}, #{driverClassName}, #{jdbcUrl}, #{username}, #{password}, #{isForbidden}, #{isAvailable}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into t_driver_catalog(catalog_name, driver_class_name, jdbc_url, username, password, is_forbidden, is_available, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.catalogName}, #{entity.driverClassName}, #{entity.jdbcUrl}, #{entity.username}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.isForbidden}, #{entity.isAvailable}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into t_driver_catalog(catalog_name, driver_class_name, jdbc_url, username, password, is_forbidden, is_available, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.catalogName}, #{entity.driverClassName}, #{entity.jdbcUrl}, #{entity.username}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.isForbidden}, #{entity.isAvailable}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update catalog_name = values(catalog_name), driver_class_name = values(driver_class_name), jdbc_url = values(jdbc_url), username = values(username), password = values(password), is_forbidden = values(is_forbidden), is_available = values(is_available), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update t_driver_catalog
catalog_name = #{catalogName},
driver_class_name = #{driverClassName},
jdbc_url = #{jdbcUrl},
username = #{username},
password = #{password},
is_forbidden = #{isForbidden},
is_available = #{isAvailable},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where catalog_id = #{catalogId}
